metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1124 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: WebKit, as used in Apple iOS before 8.3, Apple TV before 7.2, and AppleSafari before 6.2.5, 7.x before 7.1.5, and 8.x before 8.0.5, allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption and application crash) via a crafted web site, a differentvulnerability than other WebKit CVEs listed in APPLE-SA-2015-04-08-1,APPLE-SA-2015-04-08-3, and APPLE-SA-2015-04-08-4.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
